column4: Anyone off hand know how I can enable my sendmail to log host/ip of source email ...  I have a number or entries in my /var/log/maillog that I would like to find out who on my end relayed it to my maillserver.
isn't that specified in the mail headers?
yes .. but I don't have the emails.  Just maillogs.
oh, you're running a mailserver. Sorry, I have no experience with that. But I don't think you can get the sender IP without checking through the headers.
